document_data.name: Omar al-Farid
document_data.mainbody: '''Omar al-Farid''' was a [[holy slayer]] and member of the [[Grey Fire]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/Assassin Mountain/Cardsheets}}
document_data.Personality: Omar was more a follower than a leader, trusting in his sister's judgement in most matters.
document_data.Description: Omar was a chubby man who had a round face. He wore dark clothing to match his hair and eyes.
document_data.History: Omar's parents were killed when he was still a child, forcing him and his sister [[Fadiya al-Farid|Fadiya]] to fend for themselves on the streets of [[Hiyal]] until they were welcomed by the [[Everlasting]].
